alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hernando; Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hernando; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 13 at 4:23AM EST by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Pasco, southwestern Hernando, northwestern Pinellas and northwestern Hillsborough Counties through 500 AM EST... At 422 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles northwest of Beacon Square to 9 miles west of Palm Harbor to 16 miles northwest of Harbor Bluffs. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Spring Hill, Clearwater, New Port Richey, Hudson, Holiday, Weeki Wachee, Palm Harbor, New Port Richey East, Beacon Square, Keystone, East Lake, Jasmine Estates, Land O Lakes, Hernando County Airport, Timber Pines, North Weeki Wachee, Citrus Park, Safety Harbor, Oldsmar and High Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Hernando; Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hernando; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas
